markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.
name: Evocation
